paper_title.en: Preliminary Results of Water Vapor Radiometer Observations for Correction of Excess Path Delay on Precise Positioning by GPS

description.en: Temporal changes of excess path delay of microwaves due to water vapor in the troposphere have been monitored with water vapor radiometers at three sites, Uji, Shigaraki and Shionomisaki in Kinki District, southwest Japan. The algorithm for transferring the measured opacity to excess path delays determined at Denver, Colorado is applicable to the meteorological condition in Kinki by slightly modifying the retrieval coefficients. There can be seen rather stable difference of the excess path delays due to the difference of water vapor distributions at Shionomisaki and Uji which is about 160 km to the north. © 1993, The Geodetic Society of Japan. All rights reserved.
